ygData.subject: Re: What about the lvl 24 song?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh. I think I used that song once in my entire Bardic career. I wouldn t bother complaining about it though, or they d probably replace it with a new find
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Feb 18/00, Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...> wrote:
> >
> >Now that they fixed the clouding song...
> >
> >Wat was the plan for the lvl 24 see invis song?
> >
> >Does anybody remember the discussion? Is this just another useless song
> >that they are going to expect us to deal with...
> >
> >I swear, when does NWN come out?
> >
> >
>
> If you think the 24th lvl song is useless then you need to rethink your
> position. Otherwise you will find the pet users in your group will be
> mightly PO'd with you when you try to give them see invis. Also the 24th
> lvl song grants Ultravision, which is a big help to our night-blind human
> friends.
>
> FYI Very few, if ANY of our songs are useless. Some are just more
> specialized then others.

Heh. I think I used that song once in my entire Bardic career. I
wouldn't bother complaining about it though, or they'd probably replace
it with a new find true north song. Then they'd probably fill in the
missing songs with find true east, find true west and find true south.
